Job Description: Description    As a Senior Software Developer, you will Design, develop and maintain specific modules within an application or system using Java and related Technologies  Reporting to the Manager Software Development, you will be a part of the Product Engineering and Integration team responsible for software development within Baggage portfolio of SITA      What you will do     Should have worked on real live client projects/products. Experience in the Aviation industry is a plus.     Knowledge of Java, Angular 9, Spring.     Working on setting up and managing various Azure services (Blob, App Services, Event Hubs, Function Apps, Logic Apps, Azure SQL, APIM)      Experience working with MS SQL      Ability to troubleshoot issues in Azure end and managing other lifecycle related aspects.      Hand-on experience on managing CI/CD including Azure DevOps, ARM Templates, SONAR and other integration tools as part of development.      Who you are     Experience in Azure services (Blob, App Services, Event Hubs, Function Apps, Logic Apps, Azure SQL, APIM)      Experience in Java and Experience in Angular 9     Hand-on experience on managing CI/CD including Azure DevOps      Understanding of Kafka, Kubernetes
